name: SUMO Simulator
description:
Experimental SUMO Simulation game using Deep Reinforcement learning.

SUMO is the Japanese traditional wrestling sports. This game is the simulation of SUMO and it's use real-time physics and Deep Learning.

How to Play

This game has tutorial mode. 

Try tutorial mode first! It's so easy.

If you are boring with tutorial mode, try Challenge Mode!!

Technologies
  • Unity Game Engine (2019.1)
  • ML-Agents (0.8)
  • TensorFlow
  • MagicaVoxel
Authors

Program & Graphics : @iizukak

Music: @minux302
